FOLDERACTIONSDISPATCHER(8) System Manager's Manual FOLDERACTIONSDISPATCHER(8)

NAME

FolderActionsDispatcher — monitoring and settings daemon for Folder Actions

SYNOPSIS

FolderActionsDispatcher

DESCRIPTION

FolderActionsDispatcher monitors changes to the filesystem in order to automatically start configured Folder Action Scripts as needed. FolderActionsDispatcher also controls access to Folder Actions settings.

There are no configuration options for FolderActionsDispatcher. Users should not run FolderActionsDispatcher manually.

April 21, 2017 macOS
